des:
With the Kärcher Watering System Duo Smart Kit your garden magically transforms into a perfectly watered plant paradise. The system is fully automatic and irrigates thanks to weather data integration only if your plants really need it. With the Kärcher Home & Garden app, you have all the information you need and can adjust the irrigation settings individually - anytime, anywhere.

Here are the steps to a quick start with the Kärcher skill:

(1). Download the app "Kärcher Home & Garden" from the iOS App Store or from the Google Play Store.

(2). Start the app and register a Kärcher account. If you already have an account in the Kärcher online shop, it can be used.

(3). Follow the steps in the app to set up your Kärcher devices.

(4). Install the Amazon "Alexa" app from the iOS App Store or the Google Play Store.

(5). Search the "Alexa" app for the skill "Kärcher" and activate it.

(6). On the next page, enter the e-mail address of your Kärcher account including password and your region. This will connect your Kärcher account to Alexa.

(7). Say: "Alexa, ask Kärcher".

 

Sample sentences for controlling your Water Controller.

 

Start valve:

"Alexa, start Kärcher and open the left valve for 60 minutes"

"Alexa, tell Kärcher I want to start the left valve for 30 minutes."

 

Stop valve:

"Alexa, start Kärcher and stop the left valve."

"Alexa, tell Kärcher, I want to stop watering."

 

Next scheduled watering:

"Alexa, ask Kärcher, when the next watering is scheduled."

 

Start watering rule break:

"Alexa, start Kärcher and stop all scheduled watering for 12 hours."

"Alexa, start Kärcher and do not water for 3 hours.“

 

Stop watering rule break:

"Alexa, start Kärcher and cancel the break."

"Alexa, tell Kärcher, the break can be canceled."
